name: SHOOT ’EM
description:
Aliens invade and you are the ONLY person that can save the world, will you save it? That is up to you. In SHOOT ’EM you have several levels to complete, each level offering unique challenges, from fog, portals, etc.

SHOOT ’EM is a game made in Unity.  The game was made for learning purposes (I am still learning), so it’s not the best.

I uploaded the game because I would love to hear your feedback, no matter if good or bad, so I could improve, because I am still a begginer.
